mapper.select: select p.* from sys_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where rp.role_id = #{roleId} and p.del_flag = '0' and p.status = '0'

select p.* from sys_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r on r.id = rp.role_id where r.role_code = #{roleId} and p.del_flag = '0' and p.status = '0'

SELECT p.* FROM sys_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and p.del_flag = '0' and p.status = '0'
